description: Stripping out of an existing storage unit, change of use, alterations and excavation to form lower ground floor to create a one bedroom single dwelling house including creation of rear roof terrace and external alterations including front extension to create side access into dwelling. Installation of entrance gates fronting Offord Road.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed residential unit would detrimentally impact on the amenity of the future occupiers of the unit, by reason of its substandard layout, substandard levels of daylight and sunlight, unacceptable outlook; and inadequate provision and substandard level of outdoor amenity space. Therefore the proposal is contrary to policies 3.4 and 3.5 of the London Plan (2016), policies CS8 and CS9 of the Islington Core Strategy (2011) and policies DM2.1, DM3.4 and DM3.5 of the Islington Development Management Policies (2013).
